Itâ€™s a refreshing perspective, from the typical grumpy middle-aged men or young overly-ambitious young women that usually star in crime thrillers. Second, the plot is told backwards in a trilogy, meaning that The Darkness is the first volume that relates the most recent case of Hulda and the following two volumes recount events from the past.
